post:
UK Windows VPS Servers At The Best price

RareServers is providing Pure SSD Windows and Linux VPS Servers at ground breaking price. The new packages feature the latest processor, hosted in our UK datacenter with 100% network uptime guarantee, Bandwidth is truly unmetered on all UK vps server series, no catch, no caps. With our use of the most up-to-date software and more recent hardware for hosting, we are able to provide our customers with a truly reputable experience.

FEATURES:
--- Windows License Included
--- Superfast SSD Disks
--- 99.9% SLA
--- Large choice of operating systems
--- FREE Unlimited* Traffic
--- Management: Semi-management FREE
--- Pure SSD
--- Reboot and re-installation: Unlimited
--- Raid-10 protected hard drives. This means Zero down time in case of hardware failures.
--- No Setup fee
--- Remote Desktop (RDP)

_________________
